To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private EveningStar _eveningstar;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_eveningstar = EveningStar(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_eveningstar.IsReady)
{
    var current = _eveningstar.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.eveningstar = self.EveningStar(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.eveningstar.IsReady:
    current = self.eveningstar.Current.Value
